EmailTemplate.subject: Anderson - Important Funding Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!NullValue(Entities__c.client_name__c, "Sir or Madam")},
We would like to invite you to view the NEW Funding Completion Forum! https://andersonadvisors.com/land-trust-forum/
Our attorney-hosted forum outlines:
Properly Signing Your Document(s) Funding Information You Should/Should Not Provide Updating Your Insurance Carrier Plus much more!
A list of frequently asked questions is provided as well as an opportunity to request individual assistance if necessary. Please also review the cover letter that will arrive with your {!Entities__c.RecordType} documents. This letter provides step-by-step instructions on finalizing your {!Entities__c.RecordType}.
Thank you!
